name: きのせい | Kinosei
description:
"It's just your imagination"

Kinosei, a BL/Yaoi Game that takes on a manga style and is devoid of any colour and it features the love of two boys from a band called Uppercutter Sharks.

Inspired by the song Pure Imagination - Maroon 5 and my own autistic life.

Content Warning: Depiction of Anxiety, Panic Attack and brief mention of the 
IRA

Made for Yaoi Game Jam 2022

Art | Writing | Programming: @YuStarDino

Programs used

Art: Clip Studio Paint EX

Game: RenPY Engine

Music (Not by me)

Sweet Memories - LolurioPensive Piano - Jason ShawClair de Lune - Debuassy (Public Domain)
Feels Good - Jason Shaw

Sound EffectsPixabay

Support me on Ko-Fi
Buy me a coffee

Note from Star

This VN feels really unpolished but I'm way too busy with other projects to give time to properly do clean ups. I challenged myself with a weekend to finish this before I had to go back to being a busy student with a job. So honestly sorry if this game comes as really unpolished and lazy.

I didn't even have time to properly develop a story like with my other projects and it does feel largely unfinished. Also this was my first time ever using Renpy and I've only used RPG Maker in the past, Renpy is definitely better for this type of game and I learnt alot about the engine here (from using only documentation and no youtube video) and I hope I can learn more about using it with another project maybe. :D

I do hope I can share my other projects soon!
